entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023
